event.title: was voted as "the greenest and cleanest" town of Negros Oriental in 2007

data.event: The municipality was voted as "the greenest and cleanest" town of Negros Oriental in 2007.
The mayor of Valencia is Edgar Teves, who was elected in 2013.
Our Lady of the Abandoned is the patroness of Valencia, and her feast day is celebrated annually every October 12 with the town fiesta.
